items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 100)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. You have reached the top!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 380 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 77!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 55 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheat. Try 5 more for Level 12.

items.checkin_comment: A great beer with a balanced hop flavor

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 385 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 78!

Get out there and raise a ruckus with your favorite Amber or Red Ale! That is 15 different beers with the style of American Amber / Red Ale, American Amber / Red Lager, Irish Red Ale, Imperial / Double Red Ale, Red Ale - Other or IPA - Red. Try 5 more for Level 4!

items.checkin_comment: Ashes Remain show at the Recher

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 110 distinct venues!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 255 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 52!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 185 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 38. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 99)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 100!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 165 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 34! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 375 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 76!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 305 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 62!

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 30 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Euro Dark, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black or Schwarzbier. Try 5 more for Level 7!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren't you?. That's 45 different Lagers! Try 5 more to unlock Level 10.

With an interesting history based in heritage and innovation, the Vienna Lager has come, gone, and come again, regaining popularity with today's craft brewers. That's 10 different beers with the style of Lager - Vienna. Try 5 more for Level 3!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 380 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 77!

Some beer runs are so momentous they deserve their own special holiday. National Independent Beer Run Day on July 3 is dedicated to celebrating independent beer for Independence Day. Outside, grillside, or poolside, be sure to stock your cooler with independent craft beer. Find a local brewery near you to grab a pint that makes an impact!

Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 35 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 8!

items.checkin_comment: Cheers to the last weekend. This is a great beer with a nice barrel flavor that isn't overpowering

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 12)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 60 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.checkin_comment: Firkin w/ vanilla bean. Adds a touch of sweetness from the vanilla.

items.badge_description: If you only had one wish, we bet it would be to enjoy at least 10 beers from your Wish List in a 60 day period.

items.checkin_comment: Nice and smooth. Great nitro stout

items.badge_description: Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 95 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 20!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 355 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 72!

Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 15 different Pilsners. Try 5 more to unlock Level 4.
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 3 years on Untappd!

items.checkin_comment: Nice and refreshing on a hot summer day in SC

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 96)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 97!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 160 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 33!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 35 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Put down those cases of Ale Yeast because unlike the IPA, the IPL is brewed with Lager Yeast and a generous amount of hops. When you want a punch of hops with a lighter finish, reach for an India Pale Lager. That's 5 different beers with the style of Lager - IPL (India Pale Lager). Try 5 more or Level 2!
